website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for munchkin monster truck fans.
pros: Aficionado parents will appreciate that it has all the details of the real thing
cons: Best taken outside, since the wheels don’t spin on wood or solid floors

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 4yr old son for Christmas because I had similar ones as a kid. This is one is a very nice addition to our collection. He can't wait to play with it outside. Seems very durable. This kid can break things after only spending an hour with them. It's been a month and he hasn't broken anything on it (yet).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a grandson who routinely destroys plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a grandson who routinely destroys plastic toys and burns out electric gizmos. This is a simple, straightforward toy that is powered by his imagination. Of all Christmas gifts, this is the one that he dragged to bed on Christmas night
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be a large vehicle. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a large vehicle. It is about 1/2 the size of the Tonka 93931 Classic Steel Backhoe Vehicle. I was looking for vehicles to be used outside. This one is NOT it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Proctor Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The steel holds up for years of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The steel holds up for years of outdoor play in the sun. The kids love pushing them around in dirt and sand piles. They get left in the sun, rain, and out during the winter and still hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonpro

customer_reviews.title: Killer Tonka
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. Took it to his birthday party. Once it was opened it was played with by all the kids for the rest of the day . From what I hear he plays with it all the time . This Truck is going to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kinman

customer_reviews.title: The wheels doesn't spin easily, they spin better with applied pressure or on ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves it. Its well built, dropped a few times and is still in tack. The wheels doesn't spin easily, they spin better with applied pressure or on rough surfaces. It is a bit heavy, if it drops on his toe, it just might hurt him.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: we bought it from a good review from the Axel and Daddy show on Utube
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this truck! we bought it from a good review from the Axel and Daddy show on Utube!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice truck & Well made...
customer_reviews.text: This really brings back memories of childhood... Well built. I really just want the body to turn into A 1/10 RC Rock Crawler...
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Not a steel Tonka
customer_reviews.text: Says it’s steel like you expect from Tonka but it’s all plastic. We’ll see how it holds up to the abuse my grandson will inflict apon it. Seems pretty sturdy for plastic
customer_reviews.author: Ryan kittridge

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid
customer_reviews.text: The nephews really love it, it looks like daddy's nice gas powered remote control truck. It feels solid. It is standing up well to a lot of love from a two and four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vermilyea

customer_reviews.title: I wish we had Tonkas like this when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson thinks this is the best truck he has and he never lets it out of his sight.
customer_reviews.author: Timeryder

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little guy who loves monster trucks
customer_reviews.text: Three year old grandson LOVES monster trucks. This was a big hit for his birthday. I try to find Tonka toys - they are well build and hold up to hard play.
customer_reviews.author: JancieJ

customer_reviews.title: ON TIME SHIPPING,
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS A XMAS GIFT FOR GRANDSON. WAS AS I EXSPECTED.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I know my grandsons will be pushing this bad boy all around his house!!! Love it! DURABLE/tough
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monster truck for my 4 year old nephew. He loves it! The construction is sturdy and while his other (remote controlled) trucks are long broken this one survived.
customer_reviews.author: Mala

customer_reviews.title: Still a good truck my grandson and I enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Why do you call it steel when it's 90 % plastic? Still a good truck my grandson and I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: james m jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal and plastic truck without sharp edges in recessed places. Given as a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Comstock sr.

customer_reviews.title: Every thing tonka is good. I think they great quality
customer_reviews.text: Every thing tonka is good . I think they great quality products
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT I LOVE IT. Its very strong against my destructive two year old. And he loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: DenRom

customer_reviews.title: Its ok quality. Wheels would not spin on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok quality. Wheels would not spin on the wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Munilla

customer_reviews.title: Cost $40 and the wheels did not spin. Cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Cost $40 and the wheels did not spin. Cost almost $10 to send it back. So I just gave it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Who needs wheels
customer_reviews.text: Wheels slide on and off....that is it, and with out the wheels...yeah junk
customer_reviews.author: Becca V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this truck, it looks great and very well-made!
customer_reviews.author: KuHawaiian

customer_reviews.title: great transaction
customer_reviews.text: For one of my grandsons for Christmas, plays with it in the snow everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!! Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this thing. Its a beast. Metal and will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Morris

customer_reviews.title: Top quality Tonka
customer_reviews.text: Top quality metal and plastic toy that will last throught the abuse of any kid playing hard with it.
customer_reviews.author: david scott

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be sturdy enough to hold up to his exuberant
customer_reviews.text: The grandson loves it. It seems to be sturdy enough to hold up to his exuberant play
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Semon-scott

customer_reviews.title: He will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Truck is a present for my 4 year old grandson. He will love it.
customer_reviews.author: janice F

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the body was made of metal but the was made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rodel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: MEMORY
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, so hjappy to give great grand kids such a precious undestructable toy from our past..
customer_reviews.author: Linda Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the child loved it. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KJ

customer_reviews.title: Grandson love's this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Grandson's 4th Birthday he loves it very durable and shipping was quick
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I think my grandson will love it as much as y sons loved theirs
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit smaller than expected, this toy is almost as sturdily made as the Tonkas I purchased many, many years ago. I think my grandson will love it as much as y sons loved theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well made, as I had hoped from a "Tonka"
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable at All
customer_reviews.text: Wheels separate from tires causing the axle not to spin. Light use by 1 year old. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Molchan

customer_reviews.title: Great truck
customer_reviews.text: Very nice truck. Well built and my 4 year old loves it. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: echie

customer_reviews.title: All the plastic pieces have held up really well and it looks like he'll be playing with it for years
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for his first birthday. All the plastic pieces have held up really well and it looks like he'll be playing with it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P Wood

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The tires don't turn when pushed, but I haven't had time to return it yet for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but he loved it,
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson asked for a MONSTER TRUCK for Christmas,, so this is what we got him,, it was a little smaller that what I was expecting,, but he loved it,, :)
customer_reviews.author: becky holmes

customer_reviews.title: ヽ(◉◡◔)ノ
customer_reviews.text: Wheels don't roll well. Very plastic. Rugged design though. I'm sure it can take a beating outside, but this is not worth the price in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Stefen von Horten II

customer_reviews.title: I could not return it because my grandson liked it the way it was so
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying something with a remote control - but it did not have it plus the front right wheel was not turning on bare floors and it was totally not worth the money since it was even made out of plastic! That said, though, I could not return it because my grandson liked it the way it was so..... go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Eskenasy

customer_reviews.title: he just wanted a monster truck for his birthday - he's happy.
customer_reviews.text: I wondered how something made of "steel" was at such a low price. The only thing steel is the body and it's very, very thin. The rest is plastic. The tires are a very thin, very hard plastic. The front axle was warped enough the tires won't rotate most of the time. This is not what I expected from a Tonka label. But again, the price should have been an indicator it wasn't going to live up to the Tonka name. My grandson wasn't looking for quality, he just wanted a monster truck for his birthday - he's happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stopped rolling almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Seriously doubt we will ever purchase another one from this series of "Tonka" trucks and vehicles that have the same axle assembly. Both are clearly bent as none of the wheels now turn after 2 short days of our 3 year old playing with it. He rolled it off the couch and played with it like any 3 year old would and then the toy became completely useless. If you know your toddler will simply roll it across the ground and never throw it... enjoy the toy, and your weird toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sabos

customer_reviews.title: sticky wheels are annoying on a toy...
customer_reviews.text: wheels stick so it doesn't roll smoothly. but my son likes it so we will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom33

customer_reviews.title: Be glad to send you a video to show the difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Front tires don't move freely. Be glad to send you a video to show the difference between the rear tires and the front tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's a tonka trunk for kids, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Arioc

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read reviews .The majority of vehicle is plastic. I will send back tomorrow .GARBAGE !!!!!!!!! Maybe cause its funrise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My call to customer service. A great gal who listened to my complaint without making excuses. That impressed me.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the large tires which adds to its vroom attempts.My Grandson loved this 4×4 T-Rex truck. Would definitely buy it again. It was bigger than anticipated which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.F.

product_meta.title: Tonka 90604 Steel 4x4 T-Rex Vehicle
product_meta.description: The Tonka Steel 4x4 T-Rex leaves all the other competition in the dust! This free-wheeling vehicle features sturdy steel construction, a working drop door, extra-large tires, and includes all the details of the actual, full-sized Tonka vehicle! This T-Rex is built Tonka tough and guaranteed for life.
feature_bullets: Built Tonka tough with sturdy steel construction.
Features all of the details of the actual, full-sized truck!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
